caption.center: HUGO ALBERTO FUENTES, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for the Nineteenth Judicial Circuit, St. Lucie County; Gary L. Sweet, Judge; L.T. Case No. 562004CF004473A.
opinion.attorneys:
Michael D. Gelety, Fort Lauderdale, for appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Laura Fisher Zimbura, Assistant Attorney General, West Palm Beach, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
WARNER, POLEN and TAYLOR, JJ., concur.
Not final until disposition of timely filed motion forrehearing.
